title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
hi i have a 11" mac book air 
with green light orange light no power up
board looks very clean no previouse signs of work but it may have been cleaned.

ppbus_g3h  - 8.67v
pp5v_s5  - 0v

but no short to ground on pp5v_S5

following pp5v_s5 back i assume u7501 creates this 

this has no 0v onvin on ppbus_s5_hs_other_isns

power supply showes 0.03 amp at 18.5v

any help would be appreciated john

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
Post some voltages for U7501; pins 23, 13, 12, 22, 29, 21, 4.
Check for any pulse (at least) at pins 12, 21, 4; if no steady voltage detected.

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
voltages on U7501

23-  0V
13-  0V
12- 3.41V
22-  0V
29-  0.33V
21-  3.4V
4- 0V

No pulsing on 12,21,4

thank you again

john

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
bugger
i have now embarresed myself!!!
ppbus g3ht shorted the fuse had blown and i was testing the supply side so sorry
thanks again

john f

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
If you have no voltage on the VIN pin of U7501 check for a short on that pin. Also inspect closely that the trace isn't broken.

PPVRTC_G3H present at 3.3 volts?

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
"ppbus g3ht shorted the fuse had blown"
Come back with comments when you get correct PPBUS_G3H...

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
okay so i sorted out short on PPBUS_G3H
 it was C7582 shorted to earth 
this still will not post

voltages on U7501
23-    8.59v
13-    3.43v
12-    3.41v
22-    3.29v
29-    4.98v
21-     3.4v
4-         0v

no pulsing on
12
21
4
thank you john

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
You should get 3V_S5 now; confirm that.
If yes, check 3V3_SUS too.

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
thats no to either of them
PP3V3_SUS
and 
PP3V3_SO

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
Resistance to ground at 3V_S5 coil?
U7501 is enabled, change it if no short, or low value...

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
hi so i have now got
pp3v3_S5
pp3v3_sus 

both of these are 3.21 but still the board will not turn on

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message: to be fair i did not measure these correctlyin the first place

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message:
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for pulse at PM_SLP_S4_L.
If not, then post PM_RSMRST_L and check if PM_PWRBTN_L drops at same time with SMC_ONOFF_L.

title: 820-00164 green light orange light no power up
message: hi so attached a small wire to R5115 to trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and nothing on PM_SLP_S4_L  nothing on well 0.009v on PM_RSMRST_L and no volts on pm_pwrbtn_l so no drop.
